meanings.definition: A device used to measure low temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The cryometer showed that it was very cold outside.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use a cryometer to accurately measure the temperature of ice.
meanings.sent3: The cryometer joked that it was so cold, even the snowmen were shivering.
meanings.sent4: Her hands felt like a cryometer, always cold to the touch.
meanings.sent5: The cryometer beeped loudly, indicating the freezing temperature.

meanings.definition: A tool for detecting and measuring cryogenic temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The cryometer in the lab was essential for monitoring the extreme cold.
meanings.sent2: The technician used a cryometer to ensure the cryogenic tank was at the right temperature.
meanings.sent3: The cryometer chuckled when it detected the chilly conditions in the freezer.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a cryometer, frozen in place by the shocking news.
meanings.sent5: The cryometer hummed softly as it measured the cryogenic levels.
